column4: zykotick9:i dont have any blank disks. i got ubuntu using windows installer is there anyway to do it without the disk?
should i reinstall and hope the installer works properly this time?
are you letting th app work as presented and not building a partion?
i have a partition of 200 GB for ubuntu
when i try to boot into ubuntu it goes to command line
and your using a wubi install?
yes
it didnt install grub for some reason
that is your problem it does not work that way.
what do u mean?
boot a ubuntu cd and install it to that partition it has to be a ext type not a NTFS
oh so i have to reformat?
wubu is not a partition install it is a file in windows as is limited to 30 gigs.
wubi*
not according to the guide on ubuntu's website
link me to that guide.
nvm can i just move files to main partition or do i have to reinstall
not knowing what you have done I can't answer, and you seem to have some wires crossed in your understanding not sure where, but as I have exsplained is how it is.
ok im going to do a reinstall
oh the installation size is how much data is on the VM
it's a VM right?
okay, good luck just give this page a read as well. https://wiki.ubuntu.com/WubiGuide
